casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. MORRIS
v.
SUMMIT CTY. COMMON PLEAS COURT 2018-1399 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 11, 2018

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On relator's motion to strike respondent's pleadings for nonservice. Motion denied. Relator may file a response to the motion for judgment on pleadings within ten days.
